title: Create Stripe Account
description: Sign up for a Stripe account at https://stripe.com

title: Get API Keys
description: Copy your publishable and secret keys from Stripe Dashboard > Developers > API keys

title: Create Products and Prices
description: Set up your products and pricing in Stripe Dashboard > Products

title: Configure Webhooks
description: Create a webhook endpoint in Stripe Dashboard > Developers > Webhooks

title: Test Integration
description: Use Stripe's test cards to verify your integration
